content.body: The idea of introducing the concept of epics was well received by the committee
content.formatted_body: The idea of introducing the concept of epics was well received by the committee

content.body: I agree that we shouldn’t merge these all into a single proposal that proceeds lockstep
The epic wouldn’t have a stage but be a place to document and discuss relationships
content.formatted_body: The epic wouldn’t have a stage but be a place to document and discuss relationships

content.body:
> <@kriskowal:matrix.org> Tentatively, tc39/module-harmony, unless yulia would like to establish a precedent for a layer explainer repository naming convention.

no strong feelings from my side
